verbs.description: [ARG1: The annual song - and - skits dinner] [V: known] [ARG2: as the " Grand Assize] , " presented by local lawyers in the fictional " Court of Nisi Prius , " lampooned the Cleveland Indians mascot , President Donald Trump and plenty of other local , state and national newsmakers .
